Package me.agno.gridjavacore

Interface IGridSettingsProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
QueryStringGridSettingsProvider
public interface IGridSettingsProvider
The interface IGridSettingsProvider defines the methods for retrieving the sort, filter, and search settings for a grid. Implementations of this interface should provide the specific implementations for these settings.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    IGridFilterSettings
    getFilterSettings()
    Retrieves the filter settings for the grid.
    IGridSearchSettings
    getSearchSettings()
    Retrieves the search settings for the grid.
    IGridSortSettings
    getSortSettings()
    Retrieves the sort settings for the grid.
